content.title: Update on the Feelix campaign - Why we are continuing!
content.creator:
Thomas Leberer
March 12, 2025
content.content:
First of all, a big thank you to everyone who supported Feelix! Even though our Kickstarter campaign did not reach the desired goal, this does not mean the end of Feelix - quite the opposite.
What we have learned
We underestimated the marketing effort. With an average of only ten visitors per day on our campaign page, the reach was simply too low to reach enough supporters. The low visibility was ultimately the main reason why the funding target was not reached.
Why Feelix must live on
Nevertheless, one thing remains undisputed: every blind person who had Feelix in their hands didn't want to give it up!
The feedback from those affected and experts is clear - Feelix is a revolutionary technology that can change the lives of millions of people.
What's next?
We are not giving up! We are still looking for investors who want to work with us to bring Feelix to the market. Our goal remains to make this life-changing technology accessible to everyone.
Support Feelix!
Do you know companies, organizations or investors who are committed to accessible technologies? Then share Feelix with them! Together we can make it possible to give blind people a new dimension of perception.
For cooperation requests: contact@feelix.world
For seriously interested investors, I am happy to provide our business plan on request.
Stay up to date!
In our newsletter you can find out how the journey with Feelix continues.
Thank you for your support!
Thomas Leberer, inventor of Feelix
Feelix.world
